participant_1.background:
I have always enjoyed the company of animals in fantasy fiction books, but I do not have any pets of my own.
i love non gmo foods.
i would like to try sky diving.
i want to teach kids in elementary school.
I have a lot of feelings, and I like to write them down in my journal.

participant_2.background:
I am not sure that my ethnic background is relevant to my current situation.
I would love to have a pet dog but I can't because of my job.
i like to hunt for my food.
I like to take my charges hiking in the Appalachian trail.
i like rollerblading.

content.text: Hi there! I'm a future elementary school teacher.
Hi! How are you feeling about it?
I'm excited but nervous! I love kids and I've always liked to write. I'm not sure if I'll be able to have a pet dog though.
What kind of dog would you like?
I've always wanted a golden retriever. They're so friendly and cuddly.
I see. My favorite animal is a fox.
What's your favorite thing about foxes?
I like their personality and their intelligence.
I've never met a fox before.
They're pretty rare to see in the wild. I live near the Appalachian trail so I often go hiking with my charges and hope to spot one there.
That sounds like fun! I love hiking too.
It's my favorite thing to do.
What's your favorite thing about rollerblading?
I love the feeling of the wind in my hair and the freedom of movement.
That sounds nice. I've never tried it before.
You should give it a try! It's a lot of fun.
I might! I'm always looking for new things to try.
That's good. I like to try new things too
